sentences.en: A provincial magistrates' court last week ruled it unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 一家省级地方法院上周裁定其违宪。

sentences.en: At the time it faced domestic opposition as being possibly unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 当时,这项提议面临着国内极大反对的声浪,认为这不符合宪法的规定.

sentences.en: Baker and Christopher say it is ineffective and unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 贝克和克里斯托弗说,这一立法效率低而且不符合宪法.

sentences.en: Banning cigarette advertising would be unconstitutional, since selling cigarettes is legal.
sentences.cn: 既然出售香烟是合法的，那么禁止做香烟广告就是违宪的。

sentences.en: But in 1935, the Supreme Court declared the law unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 可是到了1935年, 最高法院判决此项法律为违宪.

sentences.en: claims that the President’s action was unconstitutional
sentences.cn: 认为总统行为违宪的说法

sentences.en: It declared the electric chair unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 它宣布,电椅死刑是违反宪法的.

sentences.en: It narrates the unconstitutional acts of James II.
sentences.cn: 它历数了詹姆斯二世的违法行为.

sentences.en: Such legislation is virtually per se unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 该立法实质上其本身就是违宪的.

sentences.en: That is both barbaric and unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 这既是野蛮的,更是违宪的.

sentences.en: The appeal court ruled that the action of the attorney - general was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院裁定,检察总长的行为是违反宪法的.

sentences.en: The chairman ruled that the meeting was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 董事长裁定该会议是违反章程的.

sentences.en: The law was unconstitutional, but it has not been formally repealed.
sentences.cn: 该法案是违反宪法的, 但是却从未被正式取消.

sentences.en: The Moldavian parliament has declared the elections unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 摩尔达维亚议会已宣布选举违宪。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court unanimously ruled that racial segregation in schools was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 联邦最高法院一致裁定学校实行的种族隔离措施违反宪法。

sentences.en: They common until the Supreme Court ruled them unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 在最高法院裁决这种做法违宪前,这种现象很普遍.

trans.tran_cn: 违反宪法的，不符合章程[法规]的
trans.tran_en: not allowed by the constitution(= set of rules or principles by which a country or organization is governed )
